title: Part A
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response
descriptions: The response does not indicate that the inner membranes permit different reactions to occur in different regions of the organelles.
The response indicates that the inner membranes permit different reactions to occur in different regions of the organelles.

title: Part B
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not indicate one of the following.
The response indicates one of the following.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not show a completed table with the correct values in the Volume, Surface Area, and Ratio of Volume to Surface Area columns.
The response shows a completed table with the correct values in the Volume, Surface Area, and Ratio of Volume to Surface Area columns.

title: Part D
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not indicate that the folding increases surface area (as in part c) so that the membrane can hold more enzymes, and more reactions (e.g., ATP MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaqGbbGaaeivai aabcfaaaa@3B6C@ production) can take place than if less surface area was present).

The response indicates that the folding increases surface area (as in part c) so that the membrane can hold more enzymes, and more reactions (e.g., ATP MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaqGbbGaaeivai aabcfaaaa@3B6C@ production) can take place than if less surface area was present).
